### Various Belt Groups
Consists of multiple belt groups at various positions facilitating the transport of materials across the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Belt Connection
- Ensure that there are no gaps between belts when attempting to connect them. The error "Gap detected in belt placement" indicates that belts are not aligned correctly. Double-check the alignment and continuity of belt placement before finalizing connections.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Make sure that the inserters have access to source items. If an inserter is waiting for source items, verify that the source is correctly positioned and has available items to be picked up.

### Errors with Out of Fuel Warnings
- Regularly check and refuel burner mining drills and inserters to prevent them from running out of fuel. This ensures continuous operation and avoids production halts.
